claim: Funny or Die produces The Late Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Late Late Show franchise had previously aired as The Late Late Show with Tom Snyder , then as The Late Late Show with Craig Kilborn .

claim: Funny or Die produces The Late Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As the Late Late Show set in Studio 56 set in CBS Television City , Los Angeles , was not being used for these two weeks the producers were able to pre-record two weeks of programs for broadcast in late February and early March which , in turn , gave CBS more time to strike the old set from Studio 56 and erect a new one for The Late Late Show with James Corden , also giving Corden and his team additional time to rehearse and do advance taping of segments on their new set prior to Corden 's March 23 premiere .

claim: Funny or Die produces The Late Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Late Show with David Letterman is an American late-night talk show hosted by David Letterman on CBS , the first iteration of the Late Show franchise .

claim: Funny or Die produces The Late Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After Letterman 's final Late Show , instead of airing reruns of the show or having guest host episodes of Late Show , CBS opted to put the show on hiatus in between Letterman and Colbert and instead aired reruns of scripted dramas in the 11:35 pm time slot over the summer with the branding CBS Summer Showcase .

claim: Funny or Die produces The Late Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The show used the same logo as Ferguson 's show except with Ferguson 's name removed.The Talk aired a nighttime edition in the Late Late Show timeslot for one week which was taped in its home studio and another week of Late Late Shows was filmed in New York City instead of Los Angeles .
